itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Platinum Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Metal Solvent
item.desc: A material used to change metals into a pure crystal form through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.name: Platinum Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Platinum Ore. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Bares Longsword
item.desc: A longsword possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.desc: A longbow possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Bares Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Bares Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Bares Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Destruction, Bares Staff

item.name: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame, Bares Staff

item.name: Topaz Necklace of Regeneration
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Topaz of Regeneration.

item.name: Corrupt Ruby Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Corrupt Ruby.

item.name: Topaz Earrings of Regeneration
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Topaz of Regeneration.

item.name: Bares Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Bares Shortsword of Destruction
item.desc:

item.name: Bares Shortsword of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bares Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Bares Shortsword

item.name: Ultimate Bares Shortsword
item.desc:
A Bares Shortsword developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Bares Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Bares Shortsword of Destruction, Bares Shortsword of Temptation, Bares Shortsword

item.name: Bares Shortsword of Temptation
item.desc:

item.name: Ultimate Bares Staff
item.desc:
A Bares staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Bares staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame, Bares Staff of Destruction, Bares Staff of Temptation, Bares Staff
